content: these fingerless gloves/wrist warmers represent the roanoke river valley i call home situated between peaks of the beautiful blue ridge mountains since first creating the blue ridge fingerless gloves they ve remained popular this update has stylistic refinements as well as clearer guidance for additional yarn options i hope you enjoy making them construction - worked flat and seamed at the end leaving an opening for the thumb instructions are included to work with an assortment of chunky to super bulky yarns and a schematic is included with measurements to help you use any yarn you choose the coordinating hat pattern is now available in my pattern store *update if you downloaded this pattern on august 25-26th when first uploaded please download the new pdf with corrections for row number labels *
